explanation: [0-0] A man with long blonde hair, wearing a beige hoodie, is standing in a green meadow. He is holding a wooden mallet above his head, with a green meadow in the background. The caption "Builds with science" appears at the top of the screen.

[0-2] The man continues to brandish the mallet, his hair flowing in the wind, his eyes fixed ahead. The camera then pans out to reveal a wide meadow with a cone-shaped hut made of stones on the right side of the frame. The man stands in front of the hut, hands on his hips, admiring it.
